<a0> Download the latest Java Tutorials bundle</a0>.
<a0>下载最新的 Java 教程包</a0>。

<a0>"Hello World!" for Microsoft Windows</a0> These command-line instructions are for users of Windows XP Professional, Windows XP Home, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Professional, and Windows Vista.
<a0>"Hello World!" for Microsoft Windows</a0> 这些命令行说明适用于 Windows XP Professional，Windows XP Home，Windows Server 2003，Windows 2000 Professional 和 Windows Vista 的用户。
<a0>"Hello World!" for Solaris OS and Linux</a0> These command-line instructions are for users of Solaris OS and Linux.
<a0>"Hello World!" for Solaris OS and Linux</a0> 这些命令行指令适用于 Solaris OS 和 Linux 用户。
<a0>"Hello World!" for the NetBeans IDE</a0> These instructions are for users of the NetBeans IDE.
<a0>"Hello World!" for the NetBeans IDE</a0> 这些说明适用于 NetBeans IDE 的用户。
<a0>2D Graphics</a0> — How to display and print 2D graphics in applications.
<a0>2D Graphics</a0> - 如何在应用程序中显示和打印 2D 图形。
<a0><i1/> <b2>A Closer Look at "Hello World!"</b2></a0> Discusses the "Hello World!" application, describing each section of code in detail.
<a0><i1/> <b2>A Closer Look at "Hello World!"</b2></a0> 讨论 "Hello World!" 应用程序，详细描述每个代码段。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Common Problems (and Their Solutions)</b2></a0> This is the place to go if you have trouble compiling or running the programs in this trail.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Common Problems (and Their Solutions)</b2></a0> 如果您在编译或运行此路径中的程序时遇到困难，则可以查看的页面。
<a0><i1/> <b2>The "Hello World!" Application</b2></a0> This hands-on approach describes what to download, what to install, and what to type, for creating a simple "Hello World!" application.
<a0><i1/> <b2>The "Hello World!" Application</b2></a0> 这种动手方式描述了要创建一个简单的 "Hello World!" 应用要下载什么内容，要安装什么以及要输入什么。
<a0><i1/> <b2>The Java Technology Phenomenon</b2></a0> Provides an overview of Java technology as a whole.
<a0><i1/> <b2>The Java Technology Phenomenon</b2></a0> 提供 Java 技术整体概述。
<a0>About Oracle</a0> | <a1>Contact Us</a1> | <a2>Legal Notices</a2> | <a3>Terms of Use</a3> | <a4>Your Privacy Rights</a4>
<a0>About Oracle</a0> | <a1>Contact Us</a1> | <a2>Legal Notices</a2> | <a3>Terms of Use</a3> | <a4>Your Privacy Rights</a4>
<a0>Collections</a0> — Lessons on using and extending the Java Collections Framework.
<a0>Collections</a0> - 使用和扩展 Java 集合框架的课程。
<a0>Creating a GUI with Swing</a0> — A comprehensive introduction to GUI creation on the Java platform.
<a0>Creating a GUI with Swing</a0> - 全面介绍 Java 平台上的 GUI 创建。
<a0>Creating a JavaFX GUI</a0> — A collection of JavaFX tutorials.
<a0>Creating a JavaFX GUI</a0> - 一组 JavaFX 教程。
<a0>Custom Networking</a0> — An introduction to the Java platform's powerful networking features.
<a0>Custom Networking</a0> - 介绍 Java 平台强大的网络功能。
<a0>Date-Time APIs</a0> — How to use the <t1>java.time</t1> pages to write date and time code.
<a0>Date-Time APIs</a0> - 如何使用 <t1>java.time</t1> 页编写日期和时间代码。
<a0>Deployment</a0> — How to package applications and applets using JAR files, and deploy them using Java Web Start and Java Plug-in.
<a0>Deployment</a0> - 如何使用 JAR 文件打包应用程序和 applet，并使用 Java Web Start 和 Java 插件部署它们。
<a0>Essential Classes</a0>: By taking this trail, you can find out about strings, exceptions, threads, and other Java features that are used in all kinds of Java programs.
<a0>Essential Classes</a0>：通过这一步，您可以了解用于各种 Java 程序的字符串，异常，线程和其他 Java 功能。
<a0>Essential Java Classes</a0> — Lessons on exceptions, basic input/output, concurrency, regular expressions, and the platform environment.
<a0>Essential Java Classes</a0> - 关于异常，基本输入/输出，并发，正则表达式和平台环境的课程。
<a0>Full-Screen Exclusive Mode API</a0> — How to write applications that more fully utilize the user's graphics hardware.
<a0>Full-Screen Exclusive Mode API</a0> - 如何编写更充分利用用户图形硬件的应用程序。
<a0>Generics</a0> — An enhancement to the type system that supports operations on objects of various types while providing compile-time type safety.
<a0>Generics</a0> - 对类型系统的增强，支持对各种类型对象的操作，同时提供编译时类型安全性。
<a0>Getting Started</a0> — An introduction to Java technology and lessons on installing Java development software and using it to create a simple program.
<a0>Getting Started</a0> - Java 技术的介绍以入安装 Java 开发软件并使用它创建简单程序的课程。
<a0>Internationalization</a0> — An introduction to designing software so that it can be easily adapted (localized) to various languages and regions.
<a0>Internationalization</a0> - 介绍设计软件的方法，使其可以轻松适应(本地化)到各种语言和地区。
<a0>JAXB</a0> — Introduces the Java architecture for XML Binding (JAXB) technology.
<a0>JAXB</a0> - 介绍用于 XML 绑定(JAXB)技术的 Java 体系结构。
<a0>JAXP</a0> — Introduces the Java API for XML Processing (JAXP) technology.
<a0>JAXP</a0> - 介绍用于 XML 处理的 Java API(JAXP)技术。
<a0>JDBC Database Access</a0> — Introduces an API for connectivity between the Java applications and a wide range of databases and data sources.
<a0>JDBC Database Access</a0> - 介绍用于 Java 应用程序和各种数据库和数据源之间连接的 API。
<a0>JMX</a0>— Java Management Extensions provides a standard way of managing resources such as applications, devices, and services.
<a0>JMX</a0> - Java Management Extensions 提供了管理资源（如应用程序，设备和服务）的标准方法。
<a0>JNDI</a0>— Java Naming and Directory Interface enables accessing the Naming and Directory Service such as DNS and LDAP.
<a0>JNDI</a0> - Java 命名和目录接口允许访问命名和目录服务，例如 DNS 和 LDAP。
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0> — Lessons describing the essential concepts and features of the Java Programming Language.
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0> - 描述 Java 编程语言基本概念和功能的课程。
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0>: This trail is a gentle introduction to object-oriented concepts and how the Java language implements them.
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0>：这个路径是对面向对象概念的一种温和的介绍，以及 Java 语言如何实现它们。
<a0>Preparation for Java Programming Language Certification</a0> — List of available training and tutorial resources.
<a0>Preparation for Java Programming Language Certification</a0> - 可用的培训和教程资源列表。
<a0>RMI</a0> — The Remote Method Invocation API allows an object to invoke methods of an object running on another Java Virtual Machine.
<a0>RMI</a0> - 远程方法调用 API 允许对象调用在另一个 Java 虚拟机上运行的对象的方法。
<a0>Reflection</a0> — An API that represents ("reflects") the classes, interfaces, and objects in the current Java Virtual Machine.
<a0>Reflection</a0> - 表示("反射")当前 Java 虚拟机中的类，接口和对象的 API。
<a0>Security</a0> — Java platform features that help protect applications from malicious software.
<a0>Security</a0> - 有助于保护应用程序免受恶意软件攻击的 Java 平台功能。
<a0>Sockets Direct Protocol</a0> — How to enable the Sockets Direct Protocol to take advantage of InfiniBand.
<a0>Sockets Direct Protocol</a0> - 如何启用套接字直接协议以利用 InfiniBand。
<a0>Sound</a0> — An API for playing sound data from applications.
<a0>Sound</a0> - 用于播放应用程序声音数据的 API。
<a0>The Extension Mechanism</a0> — How to make custom APIs available to all applications running on the Java platform.
<a0>The Extension Mechanism</a0> - 如何使自定义 API 可用于在 Java 平台上运行的所有应用程序。
<a0>The Java Tutorials' Blog</a0> has news and updates about the Java SE tutorials.
<a0>The Java Tutorials' Blog</a0> 有关于 Java SE 教程的新闻和更新。
<a1>Common Problems (and Their Solutions)</a1> Consult this page if you have problems compiling or running your application.
<a1>Common Problems (and Their Solutions)</a1> 如果您在编译或运行应用程序时遇到问题，请参阅此页面。
<b0>Answer 1</b0>: This is the only line of code that must change:
<b0>Answer 1</b0>：这是唯一必须更改的代码行：
<b0>Answer 2</b0>: Here's the error you get when you try to compile the program:
<b0>Answer 2</b0>：这是您尝试编译程序时遇到的错误：
<b0>Answer 4</b0>: The correct signature is <c1>public static void main(String[] args)</c1> or <c2>public static void main(String... args)</c2>
<b0>Answer 4</b0>：正确的签名是 <c1>public static void main(String[] args)</c1> 或 <c2>public static void main(String... args)</c2>
<b0>Answer 5</b0>: They can be in either order, but the convention is <c1>public static</c1>.
<b0>Answer 5</b0>：它们可以按任意顺序排列，但约定是 <c1>public static</c1>。
<b0>Answer 6</b0>: The <c1>main</c1> method defines a single parameter, usually named <c2>args</c2>, whose type is an array of <c3>String</c3> objects.
<c1>main</c1> 方法定义了一个单独的参数，通常名为 <c2>args</c2>，其类型是 <c3>String</c3> 对象。
<b0>Exercise 1</b0>: Change the <a1><c2>HelloWorldApp.java</c2></a1> program so that it displays <c3>Hola Mundo!</c3> instead of <c4>Hello World!</c4>.
<b0>Exercise 1</b0>：更改 <a1><c2>HelloWorldApp.java</c2></a1> 程序，使其显示 <c3>Hola Mundo!</c3> 而不是 <c4>Hello World!</c4>。
<b0>Exercise 2</b0>: You can find a slightly modified version of <c1>HelloWorldApp</c1> here: <a2><c3>HelloWorldApp2.java</c3></a2>
<b0>Exercise 2</b0>：您可以在这里找到 <c1>HelloWorldApp</c1> 的稍微修改版本：<a2><c3>HelloWorldApp2.java</c3></a2>

<b0>Question 1</b0>: When you compile a program written in the Java programming language, the compiler converts the human-readable source file into platform-independent code that a Java Virtual Machine can understand.
<b0>Question 1</b0>：编译用 Java 编程语言编写的程序时，编译器将可读的源文件转换为 Java 虚拟机可以理解的与平台无关的代码。

<b0>Question 2</b0>：以下哪项 <i1>不</i1> 是有效注释：

<b0>Question 3</b0>：如果在运行时看到以下错误，应该检查的第一件事是：

<b0>Question 4</b0>：<c1>main</c1> 方法的正确签名是什么？
<b0>Question 5</b0>: When declaring the <c1>main</c1> method, which modifier must come first, <c2>public</c2> or <c3>static</c3>?
<b0>Question 5</b0>：在声明 <c1>main</c1> 方法时，哪个修饰符必须先放置，<c2>public</c2> 或 <c3>static</c3>？

<b2>Next page:</b2> How Will Java Technology Change My Life?
<b2>Next page:</b2> How Will Java Technology Change My Life?
<b2>Next page:</b2> Questions and Exercises: Getting Started
<b2>Next page:</b2> Questions and Exercises: Getting Started
<b2>Next page:</b2> What Can Java Technology Do?
<b2>Next page:</b2> What Can Java Technology Do?
<s0>Application Programming Interface (API)</s0>: The API provides the core functionality of the Java programming language.
<s0>Application Programming Interface (API)</s0>：API 提供了 Java 编程语言的核心功能。
<s0>Avoid platform dependencies</s0>: You can keep your program portable by avoiding the use of libraries written in other languages.
<s0>Avoid platform dependencies</s0>：您可以通过避免使用其他语言编写的库来保持程序的可移植性。
<s0>Deployment Technologies</s0>: The JDK software provides standard mechanisms such as the Java Web Start software and Java Plug-In software for deploying your applications to end users.
<s0>Deployment Technologies</s0>：JDK 软件提供标准机制，例如用于将应用程序部署到最终用户的 Java Web Start 软件和 Java Plug-In 软件。
<s0>Develop programs more quickly</s0>: The Java programming language is simpler than C++, and as such, your development time could be up to twice as fast when writing in it.
<s0>Develop programs more quickly</s0>：Java 编程语言比 C ++更简单，因此编写它时，开发时间可能会快两倍。
<s0>Development Tools</s0>: The development tools provide everything you'll need for compiling, running, monitoring, debugging, and documenting your applications.
<s0>Development Tools</s0>：开发工具提供编译，运行，监控，调试和记录应用程序所需的一切。
<s0>Distribute software more easily</s0>: With Java Web Start software, users will be able to launch your applications with a single click of the mouse.
<s0>Distribute software more easily</s0>：使用 Java Web Start 软件，用户只需单击一下鼠标即可启动您的应用程序。
<s0>Get started quickly</s0>: Although the Java programming language is a powerful object-oriented language, it's easy to learn, especially for programmers already familiar with C or C++.
<s0>Get started quickly</s0>：尽管 Java 编程语言是一种功能强大的面向对象语言，但它很容易学习，特别是对于已经熟悉 C 或 C ++的程序员而言。

<s0>Integration Libraries</s0>: Integration libraries such as the Java IDL API, JDBC API, Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) API, Java RMI, and Java Remote Method Invocation over Internet Inter-ORB Protocol Technology (Java RMI-IIOP Technology) enable database access and manipulation of remote objects.
<s0>Integration Libraries</s0>：集成库，如 Java IDL API，JDBC API，Java 命名和目录接口(JNDI)API，Java RMI 和通过 Internet Inter-ORB 协议技术的 Java 远程方法调用(Java RMI -IIOP 技术)支持数据库访问和操作远程对象。
<s0>Note:</s0> Type all code, commands, and file names exactly as shown.
<s0>Note:</s0> 完全按照所示键入所有代码，命令和文件名。
<s0>User Interface Toolkits</s0>: The JavaFX, Swing, and Java 2D toolkits make it possible to create sophisticated Graphical User Interfaces (GUIs).
<s0>User Interface Toolkits</s0>：JavaFX，Swing 和 Java 2D 工具包可以创建复杂的图形用户界面(GUI)。
<s0>Write better code</s0>: The Java programming language encourages good coding practices, and automatic garbage collection helps you avoid memory leaks.
<s0>Write better code</s0>：Java 编程语言鼓励良好的编码实践，并且自动垃圾收集可帮助您避免内存泄漏。

<s0>Write less code</s0>: Comparisons of program metrics (class counts, method counts, and so on) suggest that a program written in the Java programming language can be four times smaller than the same program written in C++.
<s0>Write less code</s0>：项目指标比较(类计数法计数，等等)表明，一个用 java 编程语言编写的程序可以小于相同的程序，用 C++写的四倍。
<s0>Write once, run anywhere</s0>: Because applications written in the Java programming language are compiled into machine-independent bytecodes, they run consistently on any Java platform.
<s0>Write once, run anywhere</s0>：因为用 java 编程语言编写的应用程序编译成字节码运行独立于机器，他们始终在任何 java 平台。
A <c3>.class</c3> file does not contain code that is native to your processor; it instead contains <e4>bytecodes</e4> — the machine language of the Java Virtual Machine<s5><a6>1</a6></s5> (Java VM).
<c3>.class</c3> 文件不包含处理器本机的代码;它包含 <e4>bytecodes</e4> - Java 虚拟机 <s5><a6>1</a6></s5>(Java VM)的机器语言。
A <e0>platform</e0> is the hardware or software environment in which a program runs.
一个 <e0>platform</e0> 是程序运行的硬件或软件环境。
A Closer Look at the "Hello World!" Application
仔细看看 "Hello World！" 应用
A browser with JavaScript enabled is required for this page to operate properly.
这个页面需要一个启用 JavaScript 的浏览器才能正常运行。
A source file contains code, written in the Java programming language, that you and other programmers can understand.
源文件包含用 Java 编程语言编写的代码，您和其他程序员都可以理解。
About the Java Technology (The Java™ Tutorials > Getting Started > The Java Technology Phenomenon)
About the Java Technology (The Java™ Tutorials > Getting Started > The Java Technology Phenomenon)
An automatic version check at startup ensures that users are always up to date with the latest version of your software.
启动时的自动版本检查可确保用户随时了解最新版本的软件。
An overview of the software development process.
Answers to Questions and Exercises: Getting Started
问题和练习的答案：入门
Answers to Questions and Exercises: Getting Started (The Java™ Tutorials > Getting Started > )
Answers to Questions and Exercises: Getting Started (The Java™ Tutorials > Getting Started > )
As a new developer, the main tools you'll be using are the <c1>javac</c1> compiler, the <c2>java</c2> launcher, and the <c3>javadoc</c3> documentation tool.
作为一名新开发人员，您将使用的主要工具是 <c1>javac</c1> 编译器，<c2>java</c2> 启动器和 <c3>javadoc</c3> 文档工具。
As a platform-independent environment, the Java platform can be a bit slower than native code.
作为一个独立于平台的环境，Java 平台可能比本地代码慢一点。
As shown above, the most basic form of a class definition is:
如上所示，类定义的最基本形式是：
At the prompt, type <c1>dir</c1> to see the new file that was generated as follows:
在提示符处键入 <c1>dir</c1> 以查看生成的新文件，如下所示：
At the prompt, type the following command and press <b0> Enter</b0>.
在提示符处，输入以下命令并按 <b0> Enter</b0>。

Because the Java VM is available on many different operating systems, the same <c0>.class</c0> files are capable of running on Microsoft Windows, the Solaris™ Operating System (Solaris OS), Linux, or Mac OS.
由于 Java VM 在许多不同的操作系统上都可用，因此相同的 <c0>.class</c0> 文件能够在 Microsoft Windows，Solaris™操作系统(Solaris OS)，Linux 或 Mac OS 上运行。
Both the compiler (<c1>javac</c1>) and launcher (<c2>java</c2>) are <e3>case-sensitive</e3>, so you must capitalize consistently.<br4/>
编译器(<c1>javac</c1>)和启动器(<c2>java</c2>)都是 <e3>case-sensitive</e3>，因此您必须一致地大写。<br4/>
Bring up a shell, or "command," window.
调出一个 shell 或 "命令" 窗口。
Chapter 2 provides an overview of classes in general, and Chapter 4 discusses classes in detail.
第 2 章总体介绍了类，第 4 章详细讨论了类。
Command-line arguments let users affect the operation of the application without recompiling it.
命令行参数允许用户在不重新编译的情况下影响应用程序的操作。
Comments are ignored by the compiler but are useful to other programmers.
注释被编译器忽略，但对其他程序员很有用。
常见问题(及其解决方案)
Compile the Source File into a .class File
将源文件编译为.class 文件
Compile the Source File into a <c0>.class</c0> File
将源文件编译为 <c0>.class</c0> 文件
Compile the source file into a .class file
将源文件编译成.class 文件
Duke thinking about what to study
Each of the preceding buzzwords is explained in <a0><e1>The Java Language Environment</e1></a0> , a white paper written by James Gosling and Henry McGilton.
前面的每个流行语都在 James Gosling 和 Henry McGilton 写的白皮书 <a0><e1>The Java Language Environment</e1></a0> 中解释。
Each string in the array is called a <e0>command-line argument</e0>.
数组中的每个字符串都称为 <e0>command-line argument</e0>。
Every full implementation of the Java platform gives you the following features:
Java 平台的每个完整实现都会为您提供以下功能：
Examples and practices described in this page don't take advantage of improvements introduced in later releases.
本页中描述的示例和实践不利用在后续版本中引入的改进。
Figure showing MyProgram.java, API, Java Virtual Machine, and Hardware-Based Platform
该图显示了 MyProgram.java，API，Java 虚拟机和基于硬件的平台
Figure showing MyProgram.java, compiler, MyProgram.class, Java VM, and My Program running on a computer.
该图显示了在计算机上运行的 MyProgram.java，编译器，MyProgram.class，Java VM 和 My Program。
Figure showing source code, compiler, and Java VM's for Win32, Solaris OS/Linux, and Mac OS
该图显示了 Win32，Solaris OS / Linux 和 Mac OS 的源代码，编译器和 Java VM
Fix the error so that the program successfully compiles and runs.
修复错误，以便程序成功编译并运行。
For example, a sorting program might allow the user to specify that the data be sorted in descending order with this command-line argument:
例如，排序程序可能允许用户使用此命令行参数指定数据按降序排序：

It discusses both the Java programming language and platform, providing a broad overview of what this technology can do and how it will make your life easier.

The "Hello World!" application consists of three primary components: <a0>source code comments</a0>, <a1>the <c2>HelloWorldApp</c2> class definition</a1>, and <a3>the <c4>main</c4> method</a3>.
"Hello World！" 应用程序由三个主要部分组成：<a0>源码注释</a0>，<a1><c2>HelloWorldApp</c2> 类定义</a1> 和 <a3><c4>main</c4> 方法</a3>。
The "Hello World!" application ignores its command-line arguments, but you should be aware of the fact that such arguments do exist.
"Hello World！" 应用程序会忽略它的命令行参数，但您应该意识到这样的参数确实存在的事实。
The <a1>Java Language</a1> trail contains a <a2>Generics</a2> lesson that is suitable for beginners.
<a1>Java Language</a1> 路径包含适合初学者的 <a2>Generics</a2> 课程。
The <c0>main</c0> method accepts a single argument: an array of elements of type <c1>String</c1>.
<c0>main</c0> 方法接受一个参数：<c1>String</c1> 类型元素的数组。
The <c0>main</c0> method is similar to the <c1>main</c1> function in C and C++; it's the entry point for your application and will subsequently invoke all the other methods required by your program.
<c0>main</c0> 方法类似于 C 和 C ++中的 <c1>main</c1> 函数;它是您的应用程序的入口点，随后将调用您的程序所需的所有其他方法。
The <c3>javadoc</c3> tool uses doc comments when preparing automatically generated documentation.
准备自动生成的文档时，<c3>javadoc</c3> 工具使用文档注释。
The <c7>java</c7> launcher tool then runs your application with an instance of the Java Virtual Machine.
然后，<c7>java</c7> 启动程序工具使用 Java 虚拟机的一个实例运行您的应用程序。
The API and Java Virtual Machine insulate the program from the underlying hardware.
API 和 Java 虚拟机将程序与底层硬件隔离开来。
The API is a large collection of ready-made software components that provide many useful capabilities.
API 是大量现成的软件组件，提供许多有用的功能。
The Java Tutorials are practical guides for programmers who want to use the Java programming language to create applications.
Java 教程是希望使用 Java 编程语言创建应用程序的程序员的实用指南。
The Java Tutorials have been written for JDK 8.
Java 教程是为 JDK 8 编写的。
The Java application <i0>launcher tool</i0> (<c1>java</c1>) uses the Java virtual machine to run your application.
Java 应用程序 <i0>launcher tool</i0>(<c1>java</c1>)使用 Java 虚拟机来运行您的应用程序。
The Java platform differs from most other platforms in that it's a software-only platform that runs on top of other hardware-based platforms.
Java 平台不同于大多数其他平台，因为它是一个运行在其他基于硬件的平台之上的纯软件平台。
The Java platform has two components:
The Java programming language <i0>compiler</i0> (<c1>javac</c1>) takes your source file and translates its text into instructions that the Java virtual machine can understand.
Java 编程语言 <i0>compiler</i0>(<c1>javac</c1>)会将您的源文件转换为 Java 虚拟机可以理解的指令。
The Java programming language is a high-level language that can be characterized by all of the following buzzwords:
Java 编程语言是一种高级语言，可以用以下所有流行语来表征：
The Java programming language supports three kinds of comments:
Java 编程语言支持三种注释：
The NetBeans IDE runs on all of the platforms listed below.
NetBeans IDE 可在以下列出的所有平台上运行。
The NetBeans IDE runs on the Java platform, which means that you can use it with any operating system for which there is a JDK 7 available.
NetBeans IDE 在 Java 平台上运行，这意味着您可以将其用于任何可用 JDK 7 的操作系统。
The Save As dialog just before you click <b0> Save</b0>.

编译器生成了一个字节码文件 <c0>HelloWorldApp.class</c0>。
The compiler ignores everything from <c0>/*</c0> to <c1>*/</c1>.
编译器忽略从 <c0>/*</c0> 到 <c1>*/</c1> 的所有内容。
The compiler ignores everything from <c0>//</c0> to the end of the line.
编译器会忽略 <c0>//</c0> 到行尾的所有内容。
The compiler ignores this kind of comment, just like it ignores comments that use <c1>/*</c1> and <c2>*/</c2>.
编译器会忽略这种注释，就像忽略使用 <c1>/*</c1> 和 <c2>*/</c2> 的注释一样。

您已经被介绍了 Java 虚拟机;它是 Java 平台的基础，并被移植到各种基于硬件的平台上。
Your first application, <c0>HelloWorldApp</c0>, will simply display the greeting "Hello world!".
您的第一个应用程序 <c0>HelloWorldApp</c0> 将只显示问候语 "Hello world！"。
Your programs will also require fewer lines of code.
你的程序也需要更少的代码。

uses the <c0>System</c0> class from the core library to print the "Hello World!" message to standard output.
